pages.text: Instead of making the classic pressure-plate-over-tnt landmine, just make an $(o)actual$() landmine. The main difference is that landmines have an explosion radius of $(l)two$() while TNT has a radius of $(l)four$().$(br2)Landmines are armed by interacting with them ($(k:use)) after being placed. You can disarm a landmine by interacting with $(l:tools/pliers)pliers$().
You can also camouflage landmines! Try interacting with sand or vines.
